title: Tales Of Horror On Halloween Night
description: Spooky stories written by some of the most horrifying authors around: Rob Shepherd, Victoria Pagac, Rick Eddy, Linda Jenkinson, Kyle Flak, R.M. Gibson, Brandon Swarrow, Justin Coke, Kevin S. Hall, Dean Kuch, Dave J. Suscheck, Jr., Samie Sands, Georgina Price, Nicholas Boving, K.C. Finn, Anthony Pugliese, James Harper, Andy Lockwood, Amy S. Pacini, James Bryant, Cecilia H. Doldan, and Manus Tor. There's creepy poetry, terrifying stories and apocalyptic and dystopian worlds like you wouldn't believe!
author: Samie Sands
